name: Homebound Haerold
description:
Fight your way through 4 area's of Stereotypical violent persons of homicidal intent and Face off against the head honcho of each area.
Enjoy the Cacophony Soundtrack and the notable sense of immature and unintelligent early internet humor and style along with the "finely" crafted cut-scenes.
Have a Half Hearted chuckle at some of the few references you may or may not understand on you're journey home.
